headline: Delta Reports New Gold Intercept at Nova Target in Wedge Area, 4 Kilometres West of Eureka; Follow-Up Drill Program Underway
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - February 4, 2026) - Delta Resources Limited (TSXV: DLTA) (OTC Pink: DTARF) (FSE: 6GO1) ("Delta" or "the Company") is pleased to announce the discovery of a potential new gold zone in the Wedge area approximately 4 kilometres west of the Eureka Gold Deposit in Thunder Bay, Ontario. Assay results are from an additional two (2) drill holes completed as part of its recent 26-hole, 5,237-metre Fall 2025 diamond drill program. Delta is also pleased to announce the..
